name: Miguel Angel Hotel

reviews.text: Spent three nights here in August 2004 booked with Expedia
reviews.title: Great Hotel, Location
Top Notch Hotel - Loved Our Visit
Very Nice Hotel
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed at the Miguel Angel and it was great. Although not right in the middle of the museum section or the other hot-spots, it was a short bus trip or metro ride to wherever wanted to go (recommend the bus to the museums). The staff was friendly and happy to help with any issue. Le Broche was a dining experience that we really enjoyed and will never forget.

reviews.title: Smile pls
reviews.text: The hotel was quite allright for the price but some of the people at the front desk should be sent to a charm course. Some smiles pls.

reviews.title: loved Spain
reviews.text: Situated a bit away from the action but not a big problem. Maybe you could use the exercise.

reviews.title: Good and convinent
reviews.text: We had a personal guide in Madrid who was excellent. Her name Kelly O'Donnell. She spoke English and took us everywhere. The Occidental Miguel Angel was perfect in every way. Love Seville also, you must ride the AVE. Don't miss Toledo.

description: SIMPLY: EXCELLENT SERVICE Experience the true elegance of a grand 5-star city hotel in the very core of Spain’s capital city. Located on Paseo de la Castellana, right in the centre of the financial and commercial district of Madrid, its privileged situation provides easy and convenient access to Madrid-Barajas International Airport, International Fair Park IFEMA and all the major city attractions. The combination of versatile meeting & banqueting facilities, with the stylish SPA, top class dining and our trademark impeccable service, provide the best guarantee for a perfect stay. The Occidental Miguel Angel Hotel is the perfect accommodation choice for both business and leisure travellers. Staying in one of the 177 Standard Guestrooms of the Occidental Miguel Angel Hotel is equal to comfort and coziness. They are all fully furbished and equipped, offering guests a wide array of 5* services. Clients may also choose to stay in these other guestrooms types: Royal Executive, Royal Premier, Royal Junior Suite y Royal Senior Suite
